title: Transfer Learning for Spatial Autoregressive Models with Application to U.S. Presidential Election Prediction
authors: Hao Zeng, Wei Zhong, Xingbai Xu
abs: We study transfer learning for spatial autoregressive models and propose a method with theory and an application to U.S. presidential election prediction.

title: Spatial-Aware Conformal Prediction for Trustworthy Hyperspectral Image Classification
authors: Kangdao Liu, Tianhao Sun, Hao Zeng, Yongshan Zhang, Chi-Man Pun, Chi-Man Vong
venue: IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology
abs: We develop a spatial-aware conformal prediction method for hyperspectral image classification with stronger reliability under spatial structure.
